original_definition: 'gaseous fuel local space heater' means an open fronted local space heater or a closed fronted local space heater using gaseous fuel;
generated_definition: 'gaseous fuel local space heater' means a device used to heat a local space by burning gaseous fuel, typically propane or natural gas, within the space.
